backend/main.mo: Motoko backend canister managing website content, draft/live publishing, and user profiles with access-control checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and tests relevant to the project’s deployment fix.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining warm OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry including favicon, meta tags, dark mode class, and script mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component loading live content, rendering site sections, handling loading/errors, and mounting the editor dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: Error screen shown when the editor cannot load, advising the user to retry or refresh.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminEdito: Full draft-content editor dialog with tabs, preview, image selection, and save/publish flows using anonymous backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ChangeEdit: Placeholder component for future password-change functionality.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with cache clearing on logout and retry on auth errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/common/LiveConte: Displays an error message for failed content loading and provides retry and page refresh actions.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Heade: Renders a responsive header with navigation links and an editor button, including a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/sections/Content: Shows a content section with a title, body text, and three feature cards with icons.
Displays footer text, branding link, and copyright year with dynamic tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Renders a customizable hero layout with aligned text, optional image, and a Learn More button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous actor, invalidating related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAccess.ts: Provides admin status based on authentication and an admin check query for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnonymousActor.ts: Creates and caches a singleton anonymous actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnonymousWebsiteCo: Provides hooks to load, update, and publish draft website content via the anonymous actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context with login, logout, identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating live content, user profiles, roles, and admin status via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/heroLayout.ts: Maps alignment and position values to Tailwind CSS classes for hero layout rendering.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, issues, and deployment-failure context for build troubleshooting.
